headline: Why Shares in UPS Declined by 20% in the First Half of 2025
summary: UPS' earnings guidance and dividend payout could be under threat.  Cutting the dividend could be good news for investors.  Shares in United Parcel Service (NYSE: UPS), more commonly known as UPS, declined by 20% in the first half of 2025, according to data provided by S&P Global Market Intelligence.
